title: Facebook Changes Name to Meta
itunes:title: Facebook Changes Name to Meta
description:
Dr. Anna Durbin, Director of the Center for Immunization Research at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, shares her thoughts on vaccinating children. Bloomberg Technology Executive Editor Tom Giles discusses Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg announcing the company's new brand name will be "Meta" and will bring virtual reality to a broader swath of users. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Venture Capital Reporter Priya Anand talk about Priya's Businessweek Magazine story Big Teacher Is Watching: Spyware Business Sneaks Into Schools. Bloomberg News West Coast Correspondent Ed Ludlow provides more insight on Facebook re-christening itself Meta, decoupling its corporate identity from the eponymous social network mired in toxic content. And We Drive to the Close with Eric Clark, Portfolio Manager at Rational Dynamic Brands Fund.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
